bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
When upgrading kdehelpcenter to version 16.12.3-1.fc26.x86_64 dnf show this Error:
``` Error: Transaction check error: file /usr/share/doc/HTML/de/khelpcenter/glossary/index.cache.bz2 from install of khelpcenter-1:17.04.1-1.fc26.x86_64 conflicts with file from package kde-l10n-de-17.04.0-2.fc26.noarch file /usr/share/doc/HTML/de/khelpcenter/glossary/index.docbook from install of khelpcenter-1:17.04.1-1.fc26.x86_64 conflicts with file from package kde-l10n-de-17.04.0-2.fc26.noarch file /usr/share/doc/HTML/de/khelpcenter/glossary/kdeprintingglossary.docbook from install of khelpcenter-1:17.04.1-1.fc26.x86_64 conflicts with file from package kde-l10n-de-17.04.0-2.fc26.noarch
Error Summary ------------- ```
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): - Installed Version of khelpcenter: khelpcenter-16.12.3-1.fc26.x86_64 (5.7.2) - Installed Version of kde-l10n-de: kde-l10n-de-17.04.0-2.fc26.noarch - Version update of khelpcenter: khelpcenter-1:17.04.1-1.fc26
How reproducible: always
Steps to Reproduce: I'm not sure but I think: 1. dnf install khelpcenter-16.12.3-1.fc26.x86_64 kde-l10n-de-17.04.0-2.fc26.noarch 2. dnf upgrade
Actual results: DNF can't upgrade khelpcenter because of colliding files
Expected results: DNF should be able to upgrade.
Additional info:

baloo-widgets-17.04.1-1.fc26 dolphin-17.04.1-1.fc26 dolphin-plugins-17.04.1-1.fc26 kate-17.04.1-1.fc26 kde-l10n-17.04.1-1.fc26 kde-runtime-17.04.1-1.fc26 kdelibs-4.14.32-1.fc26 kdialog-17.04.1-1.fc26 keditbookmarks-17.04.1-1.fc26 kfind-17.04.1-1.fc26 khelpcenter-17.04.1-2.fc26 konqueror-17.04.1-1.fc26 konsole5-17.04.1-1.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-fa2094f948
